entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shaunavon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eastend 10:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: SE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23 except minus 16 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the Trans-Canada Highway. High minus 23 except minus 16 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the Trans-Canada Highway early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
